The U.S. government Sunday requisitioned aircraft from six commercial airlines to help in the transportation of people evacuated from Afghanistan, illustrating the challenges met by Washington after the takeover of the country by Taliban forces.
U.S. Defense Secretary Lloyd Austin has asked commercial airlines in the U.S. to provide planes to help in Afghanistan evacuation efforts.
